analysis: The documents primarily concern adjustments to the pay and allowances for various categories of federal employees, including those in the General Schedule, Foreign Service, Veterans Health Administration, Senior Executive Service, uniformed services, and members of Congress, justices, and judges. Some documents also address locality-based comparability payments and administrative law judges. The documents span several decades, indicating a recurring need to update compensation in response to economic conditions and legislation.
title: Federal Employee Compensation Updates
